short_description: folkman law is a personal injury attorney based in philadelphia, pennsylvania, united states.
long_description: south jersey and southeastern pennsylvania trial lawyers specializing in personal injury, employment law, and malpractice claims. folkman law is a team of hardworking lawyers, paralegals, and staff dedicated to protecting our clients' rights. we make our clients' needs our priority. with a broad practice that includes representing individuals and businesses in contract negotiation, arbitration, mediation, and litigation, we have extensive experience fighting for our clients in many types of cases. whether you have been injured in a motor vehicle accident, a slip and fall, a medical setting, or while on someone else's property, one of folkman law's cherry hill personal injury lawyers is ready to help you. our accomplished personal injury attorneys, employment law attorneys, and malpractice attorneys are here to help when disaster strikes. ultimately, we measure success not in millions, but rather in terms of the concrete impact our work has on the lives of clients. our personal injury lawyers, employment discrimination lawyers, business lawyers, legal malpractice lawyers, and medical malpractice lawyers are ready to serve you. $100.2 m.

generated_description: folkman law, legally known as folkman law offices p.c., is a law firm based in philadelphia, pennsylvania, with additional offices in cherry hill, new jersey. the firm specializes in personal injury, employment law, business law, legal malpractice, and medical malpractice. folkman law serves clients throughout southern new jersey and southeastern pennsylvania. the firm is known for its extensive record of six- and seven-figure case results, including a record-breaking $100 million personal injury verdict. the legal team at folkman law includes attorneys who have been certified as civil trial attorneys and trial advocates, and many have been recognized in various legal publications and professional associations. the firm is committed to protecting clients' rights and achieving successful outcomes in legal disputes.
